title: James Corden flings ice cream across studio
description: As "The Late Late Show" returned from a six-week hiatus, James Corden celebrated his 44th birthday with a brand-new desk full of ice-cream.

title: Tapper calls out lawmakers for claiming success on legislation they voted against
description: Several Republican members of Congress are trying to take credit for legislation they voted against. CNN's Jake Tapper has more.

title: Middle class Black Americans react to economy under Biden
description: Despite the growth of the Black middle class, African Americans still grapple with the worst effects of rising inflation because they lag behind their White counterparts in income, wealth, financial savings, and home ownership. CNN's Ryan Young reports.

title: Twitter is vulnerable to Russian and Chinese influence, whistleblower says
Why NASA's new Jupiter images matter to space exploration
description: NASA released new images of Jupiter from the agency's James Webb Space Telescope. CNN space correspondent Kristin Fisher breaks down what the detailed images reveal.

title: Nancy Pelosi's husband pleads guilty to DUI charge
description: Paul Pelosi, the husband of House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, pleaded guilty on Tuesday to driving under the influence of alcohol in May.

title: Jennifer Lopez offers glimpse of her wedding look
description: Jennifer Lopez Affleck is sharing her wedding look with her subscribers.

title: New timelapse shows pro-Trump mob swarming US Capitol during January 6 riot
description: The Department of Justice released the footage during the criminal trial of a man accused of assaulting several officers at the January 6 Capitol riot.

title: Why this country drinks more tea than any other
description: Atop a terrifyingly steep mountain in northeastern Turkey, the village of Haremtepe resembles an island surrounded by a vast ocean of green: verdant, bushy rows of tea plantations continue as far as the misty skies fleetingly allow to be seen.

title: See moment superyacht sinks in the Mediterranean
description: Authorities saved all passengers and crew members aboard the vessel that sank about 9 miles off the coast of Catanzaro, Italy.

title: Fan sues Nick Kyrgios over 'drunk out of her mind' comment at  Wimbledon final
description: The woman who​m Nick Kyrgios accused of having had "700 drinks" and being "drunk out of her mind" during this year's Wimbledon final in early July says she is suing the Australian tennis player for defamation.

title: Fauci responds to Republicans' promise to investigate him if they win House
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the chief medical adviser to President Biden, says the promise made by Republican lawmakers to investigate him if they win the House in the midterm elections "doesn't phase him" and played no role in his decision to leave public office.

title: Twitter whistleblower was on CNN 22 years ago. Here's what he had to say
description: Peiter "Mudge" Zatko has been a huge figure in cybersecurity for decades. Now he's coming forward to blow the whistle on Twitter's vulnerabilities. See how CNN covered Zatko's work two decades ago.

title: China turns back to coal as record heatwave causes power shortages
description: China is mining and importing more coal as its worst heatwave and drought in six decades hits hydroelectricity, the nation's second biggest source of power.

title: 'All of it is a lie': Russian paratrooper condemns war in Ukraine
Ukraine is racing to install bomb shelters in schools to prevent a lost generation
Tom Brady returns to Tampa Bay Buccaneers training camp after 11-day absence
description: "Missed you guys." Tom Brady returned to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' training camp on Monday following an 11-day leave of absence.

title: Dinosaur tracks from 113 million years ago uncovered due to severe drought conditions at Dinosaur Valley State Park
description: Dinosaur tracks dating from around 113 million years ago were revealed at Dinosaur Valley State Park in Texas due to severe drought conditions that have dried up a river, the park said Monday in a statement.

title: Nearly 100 dead in Afghanistan floods, officials say
description: Flash flooding has killed at least 95 people, injured hundreds of others and swept away thousands of homes in Afghanistan, authorities in the crisis-hit country said Tuesday.

title: In the ocean's twilight zone, this diver is discovering vibrant new species
description: Hundreds of feet below the ocean's surface, somewhere between the dark ocean floor and the bright blue shallows, lies the twilight zone.

title: Philippines returns to school for just one day as storm forces classrooms in north to close again
description: A tropical storm forced schools to close across the northern Philippines on Tuesday -- just one day after in-person learning had resumed following one of the world's longest pandemic-related shutdowns.

title: Australia to investigate former leader's secret ministerial 'power grab'
description: An independent inquiry will be held into the secret ministerial roles adopted by former Australian prime minister Scott Morrison before he was voted out of office three months ago.

title: Americans urged to leave Ukraine as new Russian attacks feared
description: The US government is urging Americans in Ukraine to leave the country immediately, warning that Russia is stepping up efforts to launch attacks on civilian infrastructure and government facilities in the coming days.

title: Trump turns his legal battle after FBI search into political rallying cry
Wildfires rage as Chinese city suffers record heat wave
Schools are building bomb shelters before reopening in September, amid concerns over pupil safety and a growing knowledge gap among Ukrainian children
description: The new school year is a day of celebration in Ukraine, where children dress up and give bouquets of flowers to their teachers.

title: Flash flooding in Dallas area takes residents by surprise as rescue crews respond to hundreds of calls for help
description: After torrential rains struck parts of northeastern Texas and sent floodwaters rushing through streets and homes, rescue crews fanned out across the region on Monday, responding to hundreds of calls for aid from residents stunned by the sudden downfall.

title: Trump turns legal battle over FBI search into rallying cry
description:
• Trump-era ICE officials told to wipe phones when leaving agency
• Video: 'They're just saying that stuff': Ex-federal judge reacts to Trump's legal move

title: Hear dolphins' victory squeals after catching prey on camera
description: The US Navy trained bottlenose dolphins to find underwater mines. A non-profit outfitted them with cameras to watch them hunt.

title: US is sending Ukraine more weapons. Hear what it means
description: Retired Col. Cedric Leighton joins CNN's Don Lemon to talk about the potential next moves for Ukraine as the US announces a new $775 million military assistance package for Kyiv.

title: Russia accuses Ukraine of Darya Dugina's murder
description: Russia has blamed Ukrainian special services for the murder of Darya Dugina, a Russian political commentator and the daughter of prominent ultranationalist ideologue Alexander Dugin, according to Russian state news agency TASS.

title: Thousands of Indian farmers return to New Delhi in fresh protests
'It is so weak': Watergate whistleblower reacts to Trump's legal move
description: John Dean and former federal judge Nancy Gertner react to former President Donald Trump's legal team asking a federal judge to appoint a "special master" to ensure the Justice Department returns any of his private documents seized during the search of Mar-a-Lago two weeks ago.

title: Dogs' eyes well up with tears of joy when reunited with their owners
description: A wagging tail, a loving lick, a playful jump, a heart-melting gaze. You know when your dog is happy to see you.

title: Why NASA is returning to the moon 50 years later with Artemis I
description: It's time to go back to the moon.

title: 'We're selling the house': Tarantula sends Will Smith scurrying
description: Will Smith posted his encounter with a tarantula on Instagram and at least one arachnologist was impressed. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.
